author: James Joyce
text: Dear Stannie: Have you sent the description of Corti to Giorgio and the whereabouts, if known, of C’s brother? Have you sent me the Piccolo for the 27 April and is it possible to have a few Triestine papers about the ‘vision’ affair? I am making this short so that you may read it while running from one son of an italo to another. Best greetings Jim
